content: #COVID19 Was quite impressed when I heard the 1st number earlier today.  Bit of simple maths means the wider picture is a lot more depressing.  At least my Mum and StepDad got their 1st dose of #PfizerBioNTech vaccine today. Small mercies.
date: Quote TweetMI6 ROGUE.COM@mi6rogue · Dec 16, 2020In the last week 137,897 people have been vaccinated against #COVID19. That's equal to 7,170,644 in 52 weeks (1year), there are currently 66.5 million people in the UK.
